goal.core.program.actions

Class UserSpecAction.PrePost

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.parser.ParsedObject
      • goal.core.program.actions.UserSpecAction.PrePost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IParsedObject, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ParsedObject>
    Enclosing class:
    UserSpecAction

    public class UserSpecAction.PrePost
extends ParsedObject
    Represents a precondition,postcondition pair as specified in the action specification section of the GOAL agent. Used as simple container.
    Author:
    K.Hindriks
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
